text: A tequila cocktail is a cocktail made with tequila. ==Examples== ===Duos=== *Simple Paloma (tequila and soda, e.g. Fresca or grapefruit-flavored Jarritos) *Skinny margarita (tequila and Rose's lime juice) *Tequila and grapefruit ===Trios=== *Batanga (tequila, lime juice, and Coca-Cola) *Margarita (tequila, orange liqueur, lime juice) *Matador (silver or blanco tequila, pineapple juice, and lime juice) *Paloma (tequila, lime juice, grapefruit soda) *Tequila Sunrise (tequila, orange juice, grenadine) ===Others=== *Ocean mist (silver tequila, blue curaçao, apricot brandy, lemon juice, egg white, sea salt) *Tequila sour (tequila, lemon juice, lime juice, agave nectar, bittercube corazon bitters, egg white) *Vampiro (tequila, tomato juice, orange juice, lime juice, honey, chili peppers, Worchestershire sauce, salt) ==References== Category:Cocktails with tequila
title: Tequila cocktail
